description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2015
http://gotochgo.com

Brian LeRoux - PhoneGap Project Team, Adobe

ABSTRACT
JavaScript has a long history of being difficult to structure and maintain. To deal with this complexity a swath of frameworks appeared over the years. Prototype.js was quickly followed by jQuery and hounded by Dojo, YUI, Mootools and [...]
